entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 3 except zero south of Plum Point.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain changing to rain near noon. Snow south of Plum Point this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 3 except zero south of Plum Point. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Rain or snow ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 05 March 2023
